section.heading: Preference tax due from corporations filing a combined return

content.p: Notwithstanding the provisions of sections12-223ato12-223e, inclusive, the tax due in relation to any corporations which have filed a combined return for any income year with other corporations for the tax imposed under this chapter in accordance with section12-223ashall be determined as follows:

The tax which would be due from each such corporation if it were filing separately under this chapter shall be determined, and the total for all corporations included in the combined return shall be added together;
the tax which would be jointly due from all corporations included in the combined return in accordance with the provisions of said sections12-223ato12-223e, inclusive, shall be determined; and
the total determined pursuant to subdivision
of this section shall be subtracted from the amount determined pursuant to subdivision

of this section. The resulting amount, in an amount not to exceed five hundred thousand dollars, shall be added to the amount determined to be due pursuant to said sections12-223ato12-223e, inclusive, and shall be due and payable as a part of the tax imposed pursuant to this chapter.
The provisions of this section shall not apply to income years commencing on or after January 1, 2016. (Return to ChapterTable of Contents)(Return toList of Chapters)(Return toList of Titles)
